mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO AS "NO",'공지'as type,NOTICE_TITLE AS "TITLE",NOTICE_WRITE_DATE AS "DATE" FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,N.* FROM (SELECT NOTICE_NO,NOTICE_TITLE,NOTICE_WRITE_DATE FROM NOTICE_TBL ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC) N) WHERE RNUM >= 1 and RNUM <= 5 UNION SELECT QNA_NO AS "NO",'질문'as type,QNA_TITLE AS "TITLE",QNA_DATE AS "DATE" FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,Q.* FROM (SELECT QNA_NO,QNA_TITLE,QNA_DATE FROM QNA_TBL ORDER BY QNA_DATE DESC) Q) WHERE RNUM >= 1 and RNUM <= 5 UNION SELECT RECIPE_NO AS "NO",'레시피'as type,RECIPE_TITLE AS "TITLE",RECIPE_WRITE_DATE AS "DATE" FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,R.* FROM (SELECT RECIPE_NO,RECIPE_TITLE,RECIPE_WRITE_DATE FROM RECIPE_TBL ORDER BY RECIPE_WRITE_DATE DESC) R) WHERE RNUM >= 1 and RNUM <= 5 ) ORDER BY 4 DESC
